name: basic_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.7 grobble
convert 10 flurb to grobble

name: chained_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 3.7 grobble
define 1 grobble = 2.1 zept
convert 10 flurb to zept

name: reverse_conversion
code:
define 1 flurb = 5.2 quib
convert 20 quib to flurb

name: arithmetic_addition
code:
define 1 flurb = 2 grobble
compute 5 flurb + 3 grobble in grobble

name: complex_expression
code:
define 1 voom = 4 zept
define 1 zept = 0.5 quib
compute 10 voom - 5 zept + 8 quib in quib
